overview.zh: IRIS网络是上海边界智能和Tendermint团队合作打造的跨链区块链网络，将是Cosmos网络生态中的第一个区域性枢纽(Hub)，并专注于为分布式商业应用提供基础设施和协议，IRIS是IRISnet Hub自己的原生通证。
overview.en: The IRIS network is intended to provide the service infrastructure for handing and coordinating on-chain transaction processing with off-chain data processing and business logic execution.
